hero.title: RoboSkills
hero.subtitle: Team Skills Visualization & Management Platform
hero.description: Track, analyze, and enhance your team's capabilities across research and development. Visualize skill distributions, identify gaps, and manage team expertise effectively.

lab.name: Your Lab
lab.description: Replace this with your lab's research focus and mission. Describe your team's expertise, research areas, and goals. This is a template - customize it to showcase what makes your lab unique.

features.title: Team Overview
features.description: Visualize your team's skill distribution across categories and identify expertise areas.

features.title: Gap Analysis
features.description: Discover skill gaps and prioritize areas for team development and recruitment.

features.title: Easy Updates
features.description: Update team member skills through an intuitive interface with GitHub PR generation.
